summary: Identified 4 key modifications needed in skill-learn/SKILL.md: (1) reverse task creation order when NOTE: tags exist, (2) add dependency from fix-it to learn-it task, (3) update learn-it description to include NOTE: -> FIX: replacement instruction, (4) update documentation. Clear division of labor: learn-it handles context updates and tag conversion, fix-it handles file-local code changes.

artifacts.summary: Research report documenting current /learn implementation, task dependency schema, and 4-phase modification approach for NOTE: tag dependency handling
